name: YourPhotos
description: Open source and fully featured implementation of Google Photos, designed to ease the transition to self-hosted solutions

name: SMASH - Website
description: Designed and developed static CMS-fed website for SMASH labs at UMD. Built with Nuxt, TailwindCSS, Netlify, & NetlifyCMS

name: MGWR Visualizer
description: Novel interactive visualization layer for Multiscale Geographically Weighted Regression. Built with Python, Vue 3, Pinia, & DeckGL

name: GeoBuckets
description: Lightweight Javascript (TypeScript, really) library for classification. Dependency free, tested, and type safe. Built with TypeScript

name: EOPlatform
description: eoplatform aims to simplify Remote Sensing by providing information on a wide swath of RS platforms and spectral composites. Made for scientists, educators, and hobbiests alike. Built with Python

name: OpenGLAM
description: An open-source implementation of NASA's Global Agriculture Monitoring System. Built with Vue 3, DeckGL, Mapbox, & Pinia
